section.title: Deleting VMs
section.para: Users can delete their own virtual machines. A running virtual machine will be abruptly stopped before it is deleted. Administrators can delete any virtual machines.

listitem.para: Log in to the CloudPlatform UI as a user or admin.
In the left navigation, click Instances.
Choose the VM that you want to delete.

Click the Destroy Instance button
Destroyinstance.png: button to destroy an instance
